name: Trade Island (itch)
description:
This game was created within 48h for the Global Startup Cities GameJam!

The theme: Win-Win situation

On Trade Island you have to earn to earn a Billion dollars to win. However, as you are just such a good-willing person, your own personal goal is to increase your reputation.

Reputation Points (RP) can be earned by trading with other companies, the more the better. More RP results in more $$ per second. Keep in mind though, the game ends when you reach a Billion, so make sure you get rid of your money at the right time for a higher reputation.

Most of the other companies on Trade Island take a fix amount of dollars from you and increase  your RP accordingly. However, there is one "golden" company that always takes all your money for 10 RP.

All trading partners have a cooldown before you can trade with them again. Therefore, choose thoughtful but quick with which company you want to trade with. After all, you should always have a big trade on spare to lose most of your money when it's nearing a Billion.
